statements: DELETE FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_name = 'Python Tutorial';
DELETE FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_type = 'tutorial' AND resource_name = 'SQL Basics';
DELETE FROM coding_classes WHERE class_id = 5 AND class_schedule < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM class_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Ebook' AND class_id = (SELECT class_id FROM coding_classes WHERE class_name = 'Java Basics');
DELETE FROM materials WHERE quantity_available < 10 AND unit_price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM Resources WHERE resource_name = 'Computer' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM resources WHERE type = 'document' OR location LIKE '%archive%';
